name: TotalElectricHospitalBedSupply
title: Total Electric Hospital Bed Supply
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Hospital bed durable medical equipment equipped with electric controls for all functions.),(Data Element Scope: Durable medical equipment - electronically controlled hospital beds as defined by US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hospital bed durable medical equipment equipped with electric controls for all functions.),(Exclusion Criteria: Hospital bed durable medical equipment with manual controls not also available as electric controls.)
